action.action-desc: Mrs. Bustos (for herself and Mr. Wenstrup) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide for the termination by a spouse of a lessee of certain leases when the lessee dies while in military service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gold Star Spouses Leasing Relief Act.

section.header: Termination of leases of premises of deceased servicemembers who die while in military service
section.text: Section 305(a) of the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (50 U.S.C. 3955) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking by lessee;
in the heading for paragraph (1), by striking In general and inserting Termination by lessee; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

The spouse of the lessee on a lease described in subsection (b)(1) may terminate the lease during the one-year period beginning on the date of the death of the lessee, if the lessee dies while in military service.
